metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2014:0133-1 -- Recommended update for sysstat
metadata.description:
This update for sysstat provides the following fixes:
* Fix 'iostat -n' crashing on nfs volumes. (bnc#799920) * Handle overflow of the {rd,wr}_ticks counters. (bnc#839091) * Inform user if sar is called without parameters and data collecting isn't enabled. (bnc#816833)
